name: Big Sbemails
description: Increases the size of embedded flash cartoons on homestarrunner.com, doubling the width and height of most of them. Intended for 1920x1080 screens. Let me know which, if any, I missed.
additional_info:
0.7:
Doubles widths of 550 and 650.
Doubles heights of 10, 400, and 550.
Resizes Virus Sbemail from 1000x425 to 1750x475.
0.7.1:
Fixed to ONLY apply to homestarrunner.com
